Detailed Description

This interface deals with the parsing of the input files.

Function Documentation

INPUT_FILES * parse_input_files ( INPUT_FILES *  listp,
cint  argc,
char *  argv[] 
)

A function that parses the command line input files arguments.

This function parses all the command line arguments that seems to be input files (by using `argc', `argv', `optind'). For each input file checks if it is acceptable (necessary conditions). If it does, adds it to the input files linked list `listp'. At the end, it returns the input files linked list `listp'.

Parameters:
listp a pointer to a `INPUT_FILES' data structure.
argc a constant integer value.
argv an array of pointers to a character.
Returns:
A pointer to a `INPUT_FILES' data structure.
